title: Lord Melchior
description: Long ago and far away, Lord Melchior ruled over his lands and his serfs with an iron hand. Taken from their homes at the cusp of adolescence and brought up in strict segregation, the boys and girls of his realm learned total obedience and rigid chastity. But when naive Zaccheus and Rasha were chosen to serve their master in his castle, they soon discovered that one of Lord Melchior's greatest pleasures was forcing his innocent young servants to violate the very laws he himself has imposed on them all their lives. This title contains elements of nonconsensual sex, anal sex and group sex
author: Varian Krylov
